short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the power of AI with the AHX (Artificial Helper for X) Summarizer, fact checker, source finder, meme generator and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing AHX - Tweet/X Summarizer, a revolutionary Chrome extension that harnesses the power of AI to enhance your Twitter/X experience. This extension is your personal AI assistant, designed to help you get the most out of every tweet.

With AHX, you can summarize lengthy threads, fact-check statements, analyze sentiment, generate jokes, memes, and even provide additional context or sources for further reading. All of this is done in real-time, right within your Twitter feed.

Our extension is built on the cutting-edge AI model from OpenAI, ensuring high-quality, accurate results. It's like having a team of researchers, comedians, and fact-checkers at your fingertips, ready to assist you at any moment.

We understand that not everyone has the same needs, so we've included a handy slider that allows you to adjust the length of your summaries. Whether you want a quick overview or a detailed breakdown, AHX has got you covered.

But that's not all! AHX also integrates seamlessly with ExtPay, providing a smooth and secure subscription process. While we offer a generous free allowance to all users, subscribing unlocks unlimited access to all features.

So why wait? Enhance your Twitter experience today with AHX - Tweet Summarizer. Discover more, scroll less, and make every tweet count!
